title: Total electric flux through cube with two charges

content.question: Conductor Y is brought into contact with conductor X and then separated. If the separation is small so that both conductors are inside the same closed cubical surface, as shown above, what is the total electric flux through the surface?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the distance separating the two conductors and the individual charges on each.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
